import { Box, Drawer, Grid, LinearProgress, makeStyles, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import { Rowing } from "@material-ui/icons"; const drawerWidthRight = 280 const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) =>{ return{ root:{ }, navRight:{ width: drawerWidthRight, //display:'none' }, drawerPaperRight:{ width : drawerWidthRight, backgroundColor:"#FFFFF", borderLeft:'0px' } }}) const RightNav = ({ServerRow}) => { const classes = useStyles() return (
Informations Prod h-Prod DEV {ServerRow.map((row) => ( {row.name} {row.hprod} {row.dev} ))}
Vérification Active Ping : SW11203 En cours
); } export default RightNav
